__e: You could have asked for help! Instead, you took the fate of the entire world in your hands, and you almost threw it away!
Because sooner or later they'll find out themselves and that won't be a happy day.
I tell you not to go running around on your own and what happens?
And I would love to think that I'd get there on my own, but probably not.
It'd be cool if we could just take a drive. You could say no.

He says if you're worried about being on your own, don't be.

I have my own fussy way of doing things.

Hai. One day, you do own way.

I was watching my own mother.

For you and for that little life inside you.
For your sake, for their sake.
- But... - For your sake, as well as theirs.
